00040 #include "Url.h"
00050 Url::Url(const string &n) : Str(n)
00051 {
00052     set_type(dods_url_c);       // override the type set by Str
00053 }
00054 
00055 BaseType *
00056 Url::ptr_duplicate()
00057 {
00058     return new Url(*this);
00059 }

00110 // Revision 1.15  1996/06/04 21:33:48  jimg
00111 // Multiple connections are now possible. It is now possible to open several
00112 // URLs at the same time and read from them in a round-robin fashion. To do
00113 // this I added data source and sink parameters to the serialize and
00114 // deserialize mfuncs. Connect was also modified so that it manages the data
00115 // source `object' (which is just an XDR pointer).

00140 // Revision 1.7  1995/03/04  14:34:52  jimg
00141 // Major modifications to the transmission and representation of values:
00142 // Added card() virtual function which is true for classes that
00143 // contain cardinal types (byte, int float, string).
00144 // Changed the representation of Str from the C rep to a C++
00145 // class represenation.
00146 // Chnaged read_val and store_val so that they take and return
00147 // types that are stored by the object (e.g., inthe case of Str
00148 // an URL, read_val returns a C++ String object).
00149 // Modified Array representations so that arrays of card()
00150 // objects are just that - no more storing strings, ... as
00151 // C would store them.
00152 // Arrays of non cardinal types are arrays of the DODS objects (e.g.,
00153 // an array of a structure is represented as an array of Structure
00154 // objects).
00155 //
00156 // Revision 1.6  1995/02/10  02:22:52  jimg
00157 // Added DBMALLOC includes and switch to code which uses malloc/free.
00158 // Private and protected symbols now start with `_'.
00159 // Added new accessors for name and type fields of BaseType; the old ones
00160 // will be removed in a future release.
00161 // Added the store_val() mfunc. It stores the given value in the object's
00162 // internal buffer.
00163 // Made both List and Str handle their values via pointers to memory.
00164 // Fixed read_val().
00165 // Made serialize/deserialize handle all malloc/free calls (even in those
00166 // cases where xdr initiates the allocation).
00167 // Fixed print_val().
00168 //
00169 // Revision 1.5  1995/01/19  20:05:20  jimg
00170 // ptr_duplicate() mfunc is now abstract virtual.
00171 // Array, ... Grid duplicate mfuncs were modified to take pointers, not
00172 // referenves.
00173 //
00174 // Revision 1.4  1995/01/11  15:54:37  jimg
00175 // Added modifications necessary for BaseType's static XDR pointers. This
00176 // was mostly a name change from xdrin/out to _xdrin/out.
00177 // Removed the two FILE pointers from ctors, since those are now set with
00178 // functions which are friends of BaseType.
